name: Satan's Spies
description:
This game was created for the No Need For Thought Jam, for the prompt "A third-person game with lots of character customization options".  In this visual novel style game, you take the mantle of an expert on humans to help your fellow demons prepare for infiltration in human society. Each secret disguise has to be carefully tailored to fit a demon researched, 100% peer reviewed, expert approved, absolutely real trust me dude, day to day situations on Earth.

Credits:

Game developer: Nikolay Ivanov

Game artist: Roger Recaldini

Writers: Nikolay Ivanov & Roger Recaldini
